ObjectAttribute.Description: Termination Options. Please note, remove entitlements option will remove roles per application too. Within a role business application termination option wins

ObjectAttribute.name: terminationExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case selected Termination Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: xDays
ObjectAttribute.Description: This is required, in case selected Termination Options is one of X Days

ObjectAttribute.name: xDeleteDays
ObjectAttribute.Description: Defer Account Deletion After X Days

ObjectAttribute.name: scramblePasswordAttr
ObjectAttribute.Description: This is required Only if connector doesn't know the name of password attribute, if scramble password and add comments is selected

ObjectAttribute.name: commentsAttr
ObjectAttribute.Description: This is required, if scramble password and add comments is selected

ObjectAttribute.name: commentsValue
ObjectAttribute.Description: This is required, if scramble password and add comments is selected

ObjectAttribute.name: moveAccountContainer
ObjectAttribute.Description: OU=Services

ObjectAttribute.name: removeEntitlementLeaverExceptionExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQEntitlementLeaverException#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQEntitlementLeaverException#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQEntitlementLeaverException#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.name: reverseleaverProcess

AllowedValues.String: Enable Immediately, Restore Birthright Access, and Move Account
Unlock Only, Restore Birthright Access, and Move Account

ObjectAttribute.Description: Reverse of Leaver, Pending X Days Requests will be removed

ObjectAttribute.name: reverseTerminationExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case selected Rehire Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apPopulationReverseLeaverOptions
ObjectAttribute.Description: List of Map Options. Please see AP Joiner documentation

ObjectAttribute.name: accountCorrelationAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Cube Attribute Name]#IIQCorrelated#[Schema Attribute Name] OR [Cube Attribute Name]#IIQCorrelated#[Schema Attribute Name]#IIQCorrelated#[Operation]

ObjectAttribute.name: accountLockAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQDisabled#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQDisabled#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQDisabled#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.name: accountDisableAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQLocked#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQLocked#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQLocked#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.name: authoritativeNonEmployee
ObjectAttribute.Description: Contractor Authoritative Source

ObjectAttribute.name: authoritativeEmployee
ObjectAttribute.Description: Employee Authoritative Source

ObjectAttribute.name: birthrightEntAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Object Type(Optional).Schema Attribute Name]#IIQEntitlementBirthright#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQEntitlementBirthright#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQEntitlementBirthright#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.name: joinerEnabled
ObjectAttribute.Description: If Enabled, ONLY Birthright/Joiner Account will be created in case no Joiner IdentityIQ Roles are selected

ObjectAttribute.name: joinerPopulationRegex
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Cube Attribute Name]#IIQJoiner#[Java Regular Expression] OR Comma Separated Group Definition Names

ObjectAttribute.name: joinerRoles
ObjectAttribute.Description: Make sure these roles are of type "Birthright Roles" and value of the extended attribute "isBirthright" is set as "True"

ObjectAttribute.name: moverProcess
ObjectAttribute.Description: Mover Options

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Process Attribute Synchronization Before Mover Certification
ObjectAttribute.name: apBeforeMoverAttrSync
ObjectAttribute.Description: This can be used when there are common Identity Trigger Attributes for Attribute Sync and Mover

ObjectAttribute.name: beforemoverAccount
ObjectAttribute.Description: Before Mover Certification Options

ObjectAttribute.name: moverExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case Before Mover Certification Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apAfterMoverJoiner
ObjectAttribute.Description: This can be used to recalculate joiner access after mover event

ObjectAttribute.name: evaluateCreateprovpolicy
ObjectAttribute.Description: Attribute Synchronization for Accounts based on Create Policy

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Rename / Move LDAP Account (DN AND/OR CN Change)
ObjectAttribute.name: renameLDAPaccount
ObjectAttribute.Description: Rename / Move LDAP Account

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Is Identity Eligible For Attribute Synchronization Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: apAttributeSyncEligibleRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Rename / Move LDAP Account

ObjectAttribute.name: moverRevocation
ObjectAttribute.Description: Mover Account Revocation Options

ObjectAttribute.name: rehireProcess

AllowedValues.String: Enable Immediately and Restore Account and Reset Password
Unlock Only and Restore Account and Reset Password

ObjectAttribute.Description: Employee Type Change (Contractor To Employee or Employee To Contractor) or Same Employee Type

ObjectAttribute.name: apAfterRehireAttrSync
ObjectAttribute.Description: This can be used when there are common Identity Trigger Attributes for Attribute Sync and Rehire

ObjectAttribute.name: rehireExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case selected Rehire Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: busApp
ObjectAttribute.Description: Used By Certification, Leaver, and Approval

ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationCustomizationRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack Global Customization Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationCreationRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack Creation Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationCorrelationRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack Correlation Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationMCustomizationRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack Managed Attribute Customization Rule

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Additional Managed Attribute Group Refresh Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationMGroupRefreshRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack Managed Attribute Group Refresh Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationAfterProvisioningRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack After Provisioning Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: apAdditionalApplicationPreIterateRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Additional Accelerator Pack Pre Iterate Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: softPolicyviolations
ObjectAttribute.Description: Comma Separated Policy Names

ObjectAttribute.name: hardPolicyviolations
ObjectAttribute.Description: Comma Separated Policy Names

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Omit or Override with Multiple Manager Approval Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: skipSupervisorApproval
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to bypass supervisor approval

ObjectAttribute.name: appBusApprovers
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enter a comma separated Cube Ids or WorkGroups

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Omit or Override IdentityIQ 1st Level Business Approvers Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: appBusApprovalRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to override 1st Level Business Approvers

ObjectAttribute.name: additionalAppBusApprovers
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enter a comma separated Cube Ids or WorkGroups

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Omit or Override IdentityIQ 2nd Level Business Approvers Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: additionalAppBusApprovalRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to override 2nd Level Business Approvers

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Display Form Name or Rule Name
ObjectAttribute.name: displayFormRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: When a form is needed to be shown during the request process.

ObjectAttribute.name: requestorFormRole
ObjectAttribute.Description: When a form is needed to be shown during the request process, access request will start by requesting this role

ObjectAttribute.categoryName: Multiple Acces or Account Request Workflows
ObjectAttribute.name: acceleratorPackEnabled
ObjectAttribute.Description: Used to make sure access request is redirected to Accelerator Pack Wrapper Workflow

ObjectAttribute.name: accountCreateEntitlements
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMAT:[Application Name]#[Application Attribute Name]#[Application Attribute Value]|[Application Name]#[Application Attribute Name]#[Application Attribute Value].

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Conditional Omit Dependency Application Entitlements Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: accountCreateConditionalRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Rule that determines if the provisioning of the dependency entitlements for this Application should be executed or not. The Rule must return a Boolean "true" value if the provisioning should be executed, or "false" if the provisioning should be skipped.

ObjectAttribute.name: privilegedEntAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Object Type(Optional).Schema Attribute Name]#IIQEntitlementPrivileged#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQEntitlementPrivileged#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQEntitlementPrivileged#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.name: privilegedAccountAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQPrivileged#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQPrivileged#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQPrivileged#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.name: beforemoverPrimaryaccount
ObjectAttribute.Description: Before Mover Only Primary Account

ObjectAttribute.name: primarySyncaccounts
ObjectAttribute.Description: Attribute Synchronization for Accounts

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Detect Change Password on Primary Account
ObjectAttribute.name: primarypasswordSyncaccounts
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password Synchronization for Accounts

ObjectAttribute.displayName: On Rehire Restore Only Primary Account
ObjectAttribute.name: rehirePrimaryaccount
ObjectAttribute.Description: Move Only Primary Account

ObjectAttribute.name: loaProcess
ObjectAttribute.Description: Leave of Absence Options

ObjectAttribute.name: loaExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case selected Leave of Absence Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: ltdProcess
ObjectAttribute.Description: Long Term Disability Options

ObjectAttribute.name: ltdExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case Long Term Disability Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: nativeChangeProcess

AllowedValues.String: Manager Certification Revocation and Automated Recovery

ObjectAttribute.Description: Native Change Detection Options

ObjectAttribute.name: targetpasswordSync
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMAT:[Application Name],[Application Name]

ObjectAttribute.name: policyType
ObjectAttribute.Description: Policy Type Options

ObjectAttribute.name: policytypeExceptions
ObjectAttribute.Description: Single Entitlement Exceptions

ObjectAttribute.name: txCombinationName
ObjectAttribute.Description: Toxic Combination Custom Name

ObjectAttribute.name: eligibilityExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Cube Attribute Name]#IIQPolicyEligibility#[Java Regular Expression] OR Population Name

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Omit Manager's Approval for Privileged Access
ObjectAttribute.name: omitmanagerPrivgaccess
ObjectAttribute.Description: Skip Manager Approval For Privileged Access

ObjectAttribute.name: enablepsaValidation
ObjectAttribute.Description: Access Request For Privileged Access To Privileged Accounts

ObjectAttribute.name: enablepswexpNotification
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enable Password Expiration Notification

ObjectAttribute.name: xdaysresetPwd
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password Reset After X days

ObjectAttribute.name: pwdexpAttr
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password Expiration Attribute

ObjectAttribute.name: beforepwdexpAttr
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password Before Expiration Day (Daily Notfications)

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Password After Expiration Days (Action on Account)
ObjectAttribute.name: afterpwdexpAttr
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password After Expiration Day (Action on Account)

ObjectAttribute.name: pwdexpAttrexpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password Format to be converted to Date

ObjectAttribute.name: pwdexpAttrexpressionRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: Return Password Expiration Date

ObjectAttribute.name: scramPwdattr
ObjectAttribute.Description: Password Attribute to be scrambled, not required for connectors that supports password operation

ObjectAttribute.name: afterPassExpProcess
ObjectAttribute.Description: After Password Expiration Options

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Return To Work From Leave of Absence Options
ObjectAttribute.name: rtwloaProcess
ObjectAttribute.Description: This is a reverse of LOA, Pending X Days Requests will be removed

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Return To Work From Leave of Absence Extended Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: rtwLOAExtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case selected Return To Work from Leave of Absence Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Return To Work From Long Term Disability Options
ObjectAttribute.name: rtwltdProcess
ObjectAttribute.Description: This is a reverse of LTD, Pending X Days Requests will be removed

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Return To Work From Long Term Disability Extended Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: rtwLTDxtendedRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule will be executed in case selected Return To Work from Long Term Disability Options is Extended Rule

ObjectAttribute.name: serviceAccountAttrExpression
ObjectAttribute.Description: SUPPORTED FORMATS: [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQService#[Schema Attribute Value]#IIQService#[Operation] OR [Schema Attribute Name]#IIQService#[Java Regular Expression]

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Append Application Name To Service Account Cube Name
ObjectAttribute.name: apAppendApplicationName
